mapper.select: select r.*, m.nickname from review r join member m on m.member_id = r.member_id where r.product_id =#{product_id} order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_id, product_id, member_id, comments, review_date, update_date, rating , image_url) values (#{review_id}, #{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{comments}, sysdate, sysdate, #{rating} , #{image_url})
mapper.select: select r.*, p.name, p.product_id, p.image_url as product_image_url from review r join product p on r.product_id = p.product_id
